name: .MONDR
description:
Move around the screen using WASD or the arrow keys.

The only objective is to avoid the colorful rectangles, which appear in various patterns and with increasing tempo. The game ends once you've been hit by red, yellow, and blue.

Made in 47.5 hours for Ludum Dare #26, using AS3 / Flixel / Paint.net / Bfxr
